title: (x) Jamie Oliver magazine font / contemporary serif - Fedra Serif B {Florian}
content:
Hi, Could anybody tell me what the main body font used in the Jamie Oliver magazine is? I've attached an image showing the font I'm talking about. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011123738im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jamieoliver_5786.png)
author: davver79

comments.content:
Hi David,

that’s [Fedra Serif B](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011123738/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra_serif_b) by [Peter Biľak](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011123738/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peter%20Bi%C4%BEak).  
F

I think the Jamie Oliver food magazine is one of the most typographically stimulating circulars on the shelf.

Mike :-)
